about_the_game:
Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. This is where the world of FLASHOUT 3 will take you and your ride to the absolute limits!



FLASHOUT 3 offers you ultra-fast ships, loops, jumps and sudden razor-sharp turns! Test your skills on the most impressive sci-fi racing tracks and try not to fall behind! But if it happens, don't sweat! Unleash the power of rockets, guns, bombs and mines to help you level down your competition!

The demo version features:



1 complete circuit (Star City) and 1 ship with 3 different weapons. You can take part in a single race or a time trial.



Don't forget to add the game to your wishlist!

Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. This is where the world of FLASHOUT 3 will take you and your ride to the absolute limits!



FLASHOUT 3 offers you ultra-fast ships, loops, jumps and sudden razor-sharp turns! Test your skills on the most impressive sci-fi racing tracks and try not to fall behind! But if it happens, don't sweat! Unleash the power of rockets, guns, bombs and mines to help you level down your competition!

The demo version features:



1 complete circuit (Star City) and 1 ship with 3 different weapons. You can take part in a single race or a time trial.



Don't forget to add the game to your wishlist!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent with 6GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required. For UHD resolutions GeForce RTX 2070 or better is recommended.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or dedicated video card is required (GeForce GTX 1060 or better)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro or Intel i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or dedicated video card is required (GeForce GTX 1080 or better)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: FLASHOUT 3 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent with 6GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required. For UHD resolutions GeForce RTX 2070 or better is recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. Check out the demo of FLASHOUT 3!
